title: [Digital Tutors] Introduction to Spreadsheets Video Tutorial-KTR
description:
[Digital Tutors] Introduction to Spreadsheets Video Tutorial-KTR
================================================================


PUBLISHER....: Digital Tutors
LANGUAGE......: ENGLISH 
AUTHOR.......: Bob Flisser
RUNTIME......: 1.9 hours



About this course::

Introduction to Spreadsheets will teach you the essentials of how to use spreadsheets, focusing mostly on Microsoft Excel. Learn how to manage workbooks, edit sheets, write formulas, use functions, format worksheets, make printouts, and create PDFs. Upon completing this course, you will have a solid foundation of how to use any spreadsheet program.



Topics include:

1.Introduction
1.1Introduction
1.2What Can You Do With a Spreadsheet
1.3Examining a Spreadsheet

2.Managing Your Files
2.1Creating Blank Workbooks and Using Templates
2.2Managing Worksheets
2.3Understanding File Formats


3.Editing Worksheets
3.1Editing Techniques
3.2Setting Up a Simple Worksheet


4.Introducing Formulas and Functions
4.1How to Write Formulas
4.2Basic Formula: Adding Numbers in a Simple Worksheet
4.3Using the Sum Function and the AutoSum Tool
4.4Using AutoSum to Add a Worksheet in Two Clicks
4.5Subtraction, Multiplication and Division in Spreadsheets
4.6Understanding Absolute References


5.Formatting and Sharing Your Spreadsheets
5.1Formatting Numbers
5.2Formatting a Worksheet
5.3Printing and Creating PDFs
5.4Embedding a Workshseet on a Web Page


6.Conclusion
6.1Conclusion
